channel.title: Server run error
channel.description: I dont know what the hell happened was just changing npc spawns and i compiled and then ran the server and i got this error on the cmd, and then the cmd closes instantly after error and then cmd pops up again and says the same thing and closes again instantly [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2654 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:3824) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:64) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Server run error
item.dc:creator: @HonorScape HonorScape
item.description:
@HonorScape wrote:

I had a problem like this. I had an incomplete code in autospawn.cfg, try looking for any of those.

Read full topic

item.title: Server run error
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Hm how weird, well actually not, then change your npc.config to how it was. I forgot npc handler deals with all npc’s lol

Read full topic

item.title: Server run error
item.dc:creator: @cruel_ko cruel ko
item.description:
@cruel_ko wrote:

didnt change anything in npc handler

Read full topic

item.title: Server run error
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

U messed something up in npchandler, undo the edits, and look for what’s wrong. Also on the right side are numbers, go to those lines in npchandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: Server run error
item.dc:creator: @cruel_ko cruel ko
item.description:
@cruel_ko wrote:

I dont know what the hell happened was just changing npc spawns and i compiled and then ran the server and i got this error on the cmd, and then the cmd closes instantly after error and then cmd pops up again and says the same thing and closes again instantly

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2654 "
        at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
        at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:3824)
        at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:33)
        at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:64)
Could not find the main class: server.Server.  Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .
